subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Auctions
lead_paragraph: Jackson bought the 10-foot-high letters that spelled out the old stadium’s name before it was razed. Now he plans to auction off the 13 letters.
snippet: Jackson bought the 10-foot-high letters that spelled out the old stadium’s name before it was razed. Now he plans to auction off the 13 letters.
